name: Warfare (itch) (Warfare Game Development)
description:
This game is still in development none of the description below does not work

Warfare is a Realistic Warfare Simulation game with Realistic Physics, Planes, Tanks, Cars, Guns you name It!, AND with Space Explore the outer world with your friends and fight in battles against other countries and become military generals, and Pay "taxes   -_-" Build your military with 100's of other people to play with, With a 1:50th scale of the earth with Procedural Generation for the world which will be preset for you guys, Fight against other countries today by downloading now

Current game version 0.1.1 Project Graphics

You can see the progress of the game here to see the new coming updates and already released updates:
https://trello.com/b/IGzika7w/warfare
